body.p: Last February, from Hong Kong, I sent you a line or two requiring an original edition of "Leaves of Grass." Have been able to ascertain where a copy may be purpurchased? IamI am very anxious to obtain one.
Will you oblige me—for a friend—with a copy of annulled lines in your autograph?—on any scrap of paper.

closer.salute: Wish best wishes, I remain, your unseen friend, in faith, hope, and charity,

postscript.l: Exult, O shores! and ring, O bells!
Walk the spot my Captain lies,
